actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: To equalize the minimum adjustments to prices for fluid milk under milk marketing orders, to establish a solids content of beverage milk, and to provide for a manufacturing allowance for milk under the milk price support program.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act, reenacted with amendments by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to equalize the adjustment price for fluid milk in all marketing areas. (Establishes a $2.50 per hundredweight minimum.) Establishes marketing order milk solid percentages for whole, lowfat, and skim milk. Authorizes Federal retail milk testing. Requires State marketing order compliance. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to establish minimum manufacturing allowances for milk manufactured into: (1) butter and nonfat dry milk; and (2) cheese.

titles.title: To equalize the minimum adjustments to prices for fluid milk under milk marketing orders, to establish a solids content of beverage milk, and to provide for a manufacturing allowance for milk under the milk price support program.
